thread.section_title: Sixity.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sixity.com | www.sixity.com
thread.title: Marty Walton

author: Marty Walton
title: Marty Walton
text: Clear and concise website. Very very very fast shipping. Kept me informed of my order with tracking and was very surprised I received my parts so quickly after ordering them. I will definitely return for anything else they have that I need. Prices were also a big factor . Not the cheapest but not the most expensive either. Would order here before I would order from somewhere with cheaper parts though. Customer for life.
